title: All My Tomorrows
description: She was the shy girl with a troubled past…He was the man who rejected her years before. Should she give him a second chance?Brittany lives a quiet life, haunted by traumatic memories that make her hide from the world—until the only man she’s ever loved comes into her life again. Several years ago, Trey had watched her blossom into a stunning young woman. But when their relationship began to heat up, he not only backed away: he moved away. When they meet again, Trey realizes that he’s been waiting for her all the time.But how can he ever persuade her to trust him again?
author: Kathryn C. Kelly
